Articles.Content:
Just some simple fun, and possibly a little bit of extra lag. Right now this is just a small powerless engine that you attach wherever you want, and it uses its own resource. You tie it to action groups to control it of course. The default lifetime of the smoke is fairly long. Yes, it uses SmokeScreen...

Download: http://www./download/q48rkgiqouawcba/AerobaticSmoke_Nazari_v1.zip

The nozzle is under the Utility category in the Hangar.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Edited May 9, 2014 by Nazari1382

download link?

That's why it's in addon development and not releases

Edited May 13, 2014 by Mach_XXII

That's why it's in addon development and not releases

True, but was getting the download ready it'll be in the OP.

Just some simple fun, and possibly a little bit of extra lag. Right now this is just a small powerless engine that you attach wherever you want, and it uses its own resource. You tie it to action groups to control it of course. The default lifetime of the smoke is fairly long. Yes, it uses SmokeScreen...

Download: http://www./download/q48rkgiqouawcba/AerobaticSmoke_Nazari_v1.zip

The nozzle is under the Utility category in the Hangar.

http://imgur.com/a/XdKDH

This will be lovely for stalls and flat spins.
Can you add colour in like in those great airplanes shows?

Joolian Air Show.

It's what popped into my head immediately.

Can you add colour in like in those great airplanes shows?

Yep, you can photoshop the image file in the part folder, and you can duplicate the part to make additional ones with more colors.

Yep, you can photoshop the image file in the part folder, and you can duplicate the part to make additional ones with more colors.

Cool! 10ch

Just a quick compatibility note: this mode was made to work only with KSP >= 0.23.5 as it use the new STAGE_PRIORITY_FLOW flow mode, it makes previous KSP release (0.23 at least) to hang forever on loading with

ArgumentException: The requested value 'STAGE_PRIORITY_FLOW' was not found.

at System.Enum.Parse (System.Type enumType, System.String value, Boolean ignoreCase) [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0

at System.Enum.Parse (System.Type enumType, System.String value) [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0

at PartResourceDefinition.Load (.ConfigNode node) [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0

at PartResourceDefinitionList.Add (.ConfigNode node) [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0

at PartResourceLibrary.LoadDefinitions () [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0

at GameDatabase+.MoveNext () [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0
Saw an awesome mod name. Should've known it was you Nazari.

Found one mistake:

// definition format is Position X, Position Y, Position Z, Up X, Up Y, Up Z, Node Size

ode_attach = 0.0, 0.0, 0.00, 0.0, 0.0, -1.0, 0

'n' is missing, don't know how it can works

(re downloaded to be sure it's come like this)

Here is a update for this mod if anyone wants https://github.com/Mecripp/Aerobatic-Smoke

And big thanks to Nazari1382

And all those who give us all these great mods to play with

Edited August 7, 2017 by Mecripp2
